attributes.action: Bring forward the inquiry into the governments handling of the covid pandemic
attributes.additional_details: This government has repeated the same mistakes of acting too late and relaxing restrictions too soon  potentially coating thousands of lives. As all restrictions are set to end on July 19th the ministers involved should have time to cooperate with an inquiry
attributes.background: The inquiry into the handling needs to be brought forward as soon as possible

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Start the independent inquiry on UK Government decisions during Covid pandemic.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587338

Start a full public inquiry into COVID by July 2021, to report within 12 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587431

Ensure the public inquiry into Covid-19 reports before the next General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585861
